trans-unit.target: 将模板中定义的回调函数绑定到 widget_class 。

trans-unit.source: Binds a child widget defined in a template to the widget_class , and also makes it available as an internal child in GtkBuilder, under the name member_name .
trans-unit.target: 将模板中定义的子窗口小部件绑定到 widget_class ，并使其在GtkBuilder中作为内部子窗口可用，名称为 member_name 。

trans-unit.source: Binds a child widget defined in a template to the widget_class .
trans-unit.target: 将模板中定义的子窗口小部件绑定到 widget_class 。

trans-unit.source: Blends together 2 images with the given blend mode.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的混合模式将2张图像混合在一起。

trans-unit.source: Bookmark file to load.
trans-unit.target: 书签文件加载。

trans-unit.source: Bookmarks: are created by the user, by dragging folders from the right pane to the left pane, or by using the “Add”. Bookmarks can be renamed and deleted by the user.
trans-unit.target: 书签：由用户创建，可以通过将文件夹从右窗格拖动到左窗格或使用“添加”来创建。书签可以由用户重命名和删除。

trans-unit.source: Both gestures must have been added to the same widget before they can be grouped.
trans-unit.target: 两种手势必须添加到同一个小组件中,才能进行分组。

trans-unit.source: Both paths should be freed with gtk_tree_path_free() after use.
trans-unit.target: 使用后，应使用 gtk_tree_path_free() 释放两个路径。

trans-unit.source: Both selections and activation are supported among other things via widget actions. This allows developers to add widgets to their lists that cause selections to change or to trigger activation via the GtkActionable interface. For a list of all supported actions see the relevant documentation.
trans-unit.target: 通过小部件操作，选择和激活都受支持。这使开发人员可以将控件添加到其列表中，从而使选择更改或通过GtkActionable界面触发激活。有关所有支持的操作的列表，请参阅相关文档。

trans-unit.source: Bottom border window.
trans-unit.target: 底部边界窗口。

trans-unit.source: Broadway-specific environment variables
trans-unit.target: 百老汇专用环境变量

trans-unit.target: 建设类型

trans-unit.target: 构建GTK

trans-unit.target: 构建用户界面

trans-unit.source: Builds the GtkBuilder UI definition at resource_path .
trans-unit.target: 在 resource_path 处构建GtkBuilder UI定义。

trans-unit.source: Builds the GtkBuilder UI definition in the file filename .
trans-unit.target: 在文件 filename 中构建GtkBuilder UI定义。

trans-unit.source: Builds the user interface described by string (in the GtkBuilder UI definition format).
trans-unit.target: 构建用 string 描述的用户界面（采用GtkBuilder UI定义格式）。

trans-unit.target: 内置动作

trans-unit.source: Built-in icon sizes.
trans-unit.target: 内置图标大小。

trans-unit.source: But it is possible to create your own shortcut controller, and add shortcuts to it.
trans-unit.target: 但可以创建自己的快捷控制器,并在其中添加快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: Button being released
trans-unit.target: 正在释放按钮

trans-unit.source: Button-like widgets like GtkToggleButton, GtkMenuButton, GtkVolumeButton, GtkLockButton, GtkColorButton or GtkFontButton use style classes such as .toggle, .popup, .scale, .lock, .color on the button node to differentiate themselves from a plain GtkButton.
trans-unit.target: GtkToggleButton，GtkMenuButton，GtkVolumeButton，GtkLockButton，GtkColorButton或GtkFontButton之类的按钮式小部件在按钮节点上使用.toggle，.popup，.scale，.lock，.color之类的样式类，以使其与普通GtkButton有所区别。

trans-unit.source: Buttons
trans-unit.target: Buttons

trans-unit.source: Buttons and Toggles
trans-unit.target: 按钮和切换器

trans-unit.source: Buttons and sensors are not constrained to triggering a single action, some GDK_SOURCE_TABLET_PAD devices feature multiple "modes", all these input elements have one current mode, which may determine the final action being triggered. Pad devices often divide buttons and sensors into groups, all elements in a group share the same current mode, but different groups may have different modes. See gdk_device_pad_get_n_groups() and gdk_device_pad_get_group_n_modes().
trans-unit.target: 按钮和传感器 GDK_SOURCE_TABLET_PAD 于触发单个动作，某些GDK_SOURCE_TABLET_PAD设备具有多个“模式”，所有这些输入元素都具有一个当前模式，这可以确定最终触发的动作。触摸板设备通常将按钮和传感器分为几组，一组中的所有元素共享相同的当前模式，但是不同的组可能具有不同的模式。请参阅 gdk_device_pad_get_n_groups() 和 gdk_device_pad_get_group_n_modes() 。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, a GtkTreeIter is a reference to a specific node on a specific model. It is a generic struct with an integer and three generic pointers. These are filled in by the model in a model-specific way. One can convert a path to an iterator by calling gtk_tree_model_get_iter(). These iterators are the primary way of accessing a model and are similar to the iterators used by GtkTextBuffer. They are generally statically allocated on the stack and only used for a short time. The model interface defines a set of operations using them for navigating the model.
trans-unit.target: 相比之下，GtkTreeIter是对特定模型上特定节点的引用。它是具有一个整数和三个通用指针的通用结构。这些由模型以特定于模型的方式填充。可以通过调用 gtk_tree_model_get_iter() 将路径转换为迭代器。这些迭代器是访问模型的主要方式，类似于GtkTextBuffer所使用的迭代器。它们通常静态地分配在堆栈上，并且只能使用很短的时间。模型界面定义了一组操作，使用这些操作可以浏览模型。

trans-unit.source: By default GtkPrintOperation uses an external application to do print preview. To implement a custom print preview, an application must connect to the preview signal. The functions gtk_print_operation_preview_render_page(), gtk_print_operation_preview_end_preview() and gtk_print_operation_preview_is_selected() are useful when implementing a print preview.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GtkPrintOperation使用外部应用程序进行打印预览。要实现自定义打印预览，应用程序必须连接到预览信号。 gtk_print_operation_preview_render_page() ， gtk_print_operation_preview_end_preview() 和 gtk_print_operation_preview_is_selected() 函数在实现打印预览时很有用。

trans-unit.source: By default gestures react to both GDK_BUTTON_PRIMARY and touch events, gtk_gesture_single_set_touch_only() can be used to change the touch behavior. Callers may also specify a different mouse button number to interact with through gtk_gesture_single_set_button(), or react to any mouse button by setting 0. While the gesture is active, the button being currently pressed can be known through gtk_gesture_single_get_current_button().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，手势会同时 GDK_BUTTON_PRIMARY 和触摸事件，可以使用 gtk_gesture_single_set_touch_only() 更改触摸行为。 gtk_gesture_single_set_button() 者还可以通过gtk_gesture_single_set_button（）指定不同的鼠标按钮编号进行交互，或者通过将其设置为0来响应任何鼠标按钮。在激活手势的同时，可以通过 gtk_gesture_single_get_current_button() 知道当前被按下的按钮。

trans-unit.source: By default the “system” cursor theme is used. This makes GTK prefer cursors that Windows currently uses, falling back to Adwaita cursors and (as the last resort) built-in X cursors.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用“系统”光标主题。这使得GTK更喜欢Windows当前使用的游标，而后退到Adwaita游标和（作为最后的手段）内置X游标。

trans-unit.source: By default the GtkHeaderBar uses a GtkLabel displaying the title of the window it is contained in as the title widget, equivalent to the following UI definition:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GtkHeaderBar使用GtkLabel显示包含在其中的窗口的标题作为标题小部件，等效于以下UI定义：

trans-unit.source: By default, GtkPopover performs a grab, in order to ensure input events get redirected to it while it is shown, and also so the popover is dismissed in the expected situations (clicks outside the popover, or the Escape key being pressed). If no such modal behavior is desired on a popover, gtk_popover_set_autohide() may be called on it to tweak its behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GtkPopover执行一次抓取，以确保在显示输入事件时将其重定向到它，因此，在预期的情况下（在弹出式窗口之外单击或按下Escape键）也将弹出式窗口关闭。如果在弹出窗口上不需要这种模态行为，则可以在其上调用 gtk_popover_set_autohide() 来调整其行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, GTK picks the best invisible char available in the current font. If you set the invisible char to 0, then the user will get no feedback at all; there will be no text on the screen as they type.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,GTK会选择当前字体中最好的隐形字符。如果你把隐形字符设置为0,那么用户就不会得到任何反馈;当他们输入时,屏幕上不会有任何文字。

trans-unit.source: By default, GTK picks the best invisible character available in the current font, but it can be changed with gtk_entry_set_invisible_char().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GTK选择当前字体中可用的最佳不可见字符，但是可以使用 gtk_entry_set_invisible_char() 进行更改。

trans-unit.source: By default, GTK picks the best invisible character available in the current font, but it can be changed with gtk_text_set_invisible_char().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GTK选择当前字体中可用的最佳不可见字符，但可以使用 gtk_text_set_invisible_char() 进行更改。

trans-unit.source: By default, GTK will build quite a few tests and demos. While these are useful on a developer system, they are not needed when GTK is built e.g. for a flatpak runtime. These options allow to disable building tests and demos.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,GTK会构建很多测试和演示.虽然这些在开发者系统上很有用,但是当GTK被构建时,例如在flatpak运行时就不需要它们了。这些选项允许禁用构建测试和demo。

trans-unit.source: By default, GTK will limit rate of input events. On stylus input where accuracy of strokes is paramount, this function returns the accumulated coordinate/timing state before the emission of the current “motion” signal.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GTK将限制输入事件的速率。对于笔触精度至关重要的手写笔输入，此功能将在发出当前“运动”信号之前返回累积的坐标/正时状态。

trans-unit.source: By default, GTK will try to build the gstreamer backend for media playback support. This option can be used to explicitly control which media backends should be built.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,GTK将尝试构建支持媒体播放的gstreamer后端。这个选项可以用来明确控制哪些媒体后端应该被构建。

trans-unit.source: By default, GTK will try to build various print backends if their dependencies are found. This option can be used to explicitly control which print backends should be built.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,如果找到了打印后端的依赖关系,GTK会尝试构建各种打印后端。这个选项可以用来明确控制哪些打印后端应该被构建。

trans-unit.source: By default, GTK will try to build with support for the Vulkan graphics API in addition to cairo and OpenGL. This option can be used to explicitly control whether Vulkan should be used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,GTK除了支持cairo和OpenGL之外,还会尝试使用Vulkan图形API进行构建。这个选项可以用来明确控制是否应该使用Vulkan。

trans-unit.source: By default, GTK will try to link against the Xinerama libraries if they are found. This option can be used to explicitly control whether Xinerama should be used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,如果找到Xinerama库,GTK会尝试链接它们。这个选项可以用来明确控制是否应该使用Xinerama。

trans-unit.source: By default, GTK will use its own implementation of GtkBuilderScope for the C language which can be created via gtk_builder_cscope_new().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GTK将对G语言使用其自己的GtkBuilderScope实现，该实现可通过 gtk_builder_cscope_new() 创建。

trans-unit.source: By default, GtkLinkButton calls gtk_show_uri() when the button is clicked. This behaviour can be overridden by connecting to the “activate-link” signal and returning TRUE from the signal handler.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，单击该按钮时GtkLinkBut​​ton会调用 gtk_show_uri() 。通过连接到“ activate-link”信号并从信号处理程序返回 TRUE ，可以覆盖此行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, after showing the first GtkWindow, GTK calls gdk_display_notify_startup_complete(). Call this function to disable the automatic startup notification. You might do this if your first window is a splash screen, and you want to delay notification until after your real main window has been shown, for example.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，在显示第一个GtkWindow之后，GTK调用 gdk_display_notify_startup_complete() 。调用此功能可禁用自动启动通知。例如，如果您的第一个窗口是启动屏幕，并且您想将通知延迟到显示真正的主窗口之后，则可以执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: By default, all sequences start out in the GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_NONE state, sequences in this state trigger the gesture event handler, but event propagation will continue unstopped by gestures.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有序列均以GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_NONE状态开始，处于此状态的序列会触发手势事件处理程序，但事件传播将继续不受手势的限制。

trans-unit.source: By default, expressions are not paying attention to changes and evaluation is just a snapshot of the current state at a given time. To get informed about changes, an expression needs to be "watched" via a GtkExpressionWatch, which will cause a callback to be called whenever the value of the expression may have changed. gtk_expression_watch() starts watching an expression, and gtk_expression_watch_unwatch() stops.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，表达式不关注更改，评估只是给定时间当前状态的快照。为了获得有关更改的通知，需要通过GtkExpressionWatch来“监视”表达式，只要表达式的值可能发生更改，这都会导致调用回调。 gtk_expression_watch() 开始监视表达式，并且 gtk_expression_watch_unwatch() 停止。

trans-unit.source: By default, incremental filtering is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,增量过滤被禁用。

trans-unit.source: By default, incremental sorting is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,增量排序被禁用。

trans-unit.source: By default, list items are activatable
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,列表项是可以激活的

trans-unit.source: By default, list items are selectable. When rebinding them to a new item, they will also be reset to be selectable by GTK.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,列表项是可以选择的.当把它们重新绑定到一个新的项目时,它们也会被GTK重置为可选择的。

trans-unit.source: By default, the GtkSpinner widget draws one full cycle of the animation, consisting of 12 frames, in 750 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，GtkSpinner小部件在750毫秒内绘制一个完整的动画周期，包括12帧。

trans-unit.source: By default, widgets automatically expand if any of their children want to expand. (To see if a widget will automatically expand given its current children and state, call gtk_widget_compute_expand(). A container can decide how the expandability of children affects the expansion of the container by overriding the compute_expand virtual method on GtkWidget.).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果小部件的任何子部件要扩展，则它们会自动扩展。（要查看在给定其当前子项和状态的情况下小部件是否会自动扩展，请调用 gtk_widget_compute_expand() 。容器可以通过覆盖GtkWidget上的compute_expand虚拟方法来决定子级的可扩展性如何影响容器的扩展。）

trans-unit.source: By default, windows are decorated with a title bar, resize controls, etc. Some window managers allow GTK to disable these decorations, creating a borderless window. If you set the decorated property to FALSE using this function, GTK will do its best to convince the window manager not to decorate the window. Depending on the system, this function may not have any effect when called on a window that is already visible, so you should call it before calling gtk_widget_show().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，窗口装饰有标题栏，调整大小控件等。某些窗口管理器允许GTK禁用这些装饰，从而创建无边界窗口。如果使用此功能将装饰的属性设置为 FALSE ，GTK将尽力说服窗口管理器不要装饰窗口。根据系统的不同，在已经可见的窗口上调用此函数时可能不会起作用，因此应在调用 gtk_widget_show() 之前调用它。

trans-unit.source: By default, windows have a close button in the window frame. Some window managers allow GTK to disable this button. If you set the deletable property to FALSE using this function, GTK will do its best to convince the window manager not to show a close button. Depending on the system, this function may not have any effect when called on a window that is already visible, so you should call it before calling gtk_widget_show().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，窗口在窗口框架中有一个关闭按钮。一些窗口管理器允许GTK禁用此按钮。如果使用此功能将deletable属性设置为 FALSE ，GTK将尽力说服窗口管理器不要显示关闭按钮。根据系统的不同，在已经可见的窗口上调用此函数时可能不会起作用，因此应在调用 gtk_widget_show() 之前调用它。

trans-unit.source: By setting a filter function on the box one can decide dynamically which of the children to show. For instance, to implement a search function that only shows the children matching the search terms.
trans-unit.target: 通过在 box 上设置过滤器功能，可以动态决定要显示哪个孩子。例如，实现仅显示与搜索词匹配的子项的搜索功能。

trans-unit.source: By setting a filter function on the box one can decide dynamically which of the rows to show. For instance, to implement a search function on a list that filters the original list to only show the matching rows.
trans-unit.target: 通过在 box 上设置过滤器功能，可以动态决定要显示的行。例如，要在列表上实现搜索功能，以过滤原始列表以仅显示匹配的行。

trans-unit.source: By setting a header function on the box one can dynamically add headers in front of rows, depending on the contents of the row and its position in the list. For instance, one could use it to add headers in front of the first item of a new kind, in a list sorted by the kind.
trans-unit.target: 通过在 box 上设置标题功能，可以根据行的内容及其在列表中的位置在行前面动态添加标题。例如，可以使用它在新种类的第一项前面添加标题，该标题按种类排序。

trans-unit.source: By setting a sort function on the box , one can dynamically reorder the children of the box, based on the contents of the children.
trans-unit.target: 通过在 box 上设置排序功能，可以基于子元素的内容动态地重新排序盒子的子元素。

trans-unit.source: By setting a sort function on the box one can dynamically reorder the rows of the list, based on the contents of the rows.
trans-unit.target: 通过在 box 上设置排序功能，可以基于行的内容动态地重新排列列表的行。

trans-unit.source: By taking multiple constraints and applying them to the children of a widget using GtkConstraintLayout, it's possible to describe complex layout policies; each constraint applied to a child or to the parent widgets contributes to the full description of the layout, in terms of parameters for resolving the value of each attribute.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用GtkConstraintLayout采取多个约束并将其应用于窗口小部件的子代，可以描述复杂的布局策略。就用于解析每个属性值的参数而言，应用于子级或父级小部件的每个约束都有助于布局的完整描述。

trans-unit.source: Bypass caching for CSS style properties
trans-unit.target: 绕过CSS样式属性的缓存

trans-unit.source: CSD is always used for windows with a custom titlebar widget set, as the WM should not draw another titlebar or other decorations around the custom one.
trans-unit.target: CSD总是用于带有自定义标题栏小部件集的窗口,因为WM不应该在自定义标题栏周围绘制另一个标题栏或其他装饰。

trans-unit.source: CSS data loaded in memory.
trans-unit.target: 内存中加载的CSS数据。

trans-unit.source: CSS in GTK
trans-unit.target: GTK中的CSS

trans-unit.source: CSS names
trans-unit.target: CSS名称

trans-unit.source: CSS node
trans-unit.target: CSS节点

trans-unit.source: CSS nodes
trans-unit.target: CSS节点

trans-unit.source: Calculates the minimum and natural height for the area if the passed context would be allocated the given width. When implementing this virtual method it is safe to assume that context has already stored the aligned cell widths for every GtkTreeModel row that context will be allocated for since this information was stored at GtkCellAreaClass.get_preferred_width() time. This virtual method should also store any necessary alignments of cell heights for the case that the context is allocated a height.
trans-unit.target: 如果将为传递的 context 分配给定宽度，则计算该区域的最小自然高度。实施此虚拟方法时，可以安全地假定 context 已经为要为其分配 context 每个GtkTreeModel行存储了对齐的单元格宽度，因为此信息是在 GtkCellAreaClass.get_preferred_width() 时存储的。对于为上下文分配高度的情况，此虚拟方法还应存储任何必要的单元格高度对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the minimum and natural height of the areas cells with the current attributes applied. Essentially this is the same as GtkCellAreaClass.get_preferred_width() only for areas that are being requested as GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_WIDTH_FOR_HEIGHT.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前属性计算区域像元的最小和自然高度。本质上，这仅与被请求为 GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_WIDTH_FOR_HEIGHT 的区域才与 GtkCellAreaClass.get_preferred_width() 相同。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the minimum and natural width for the area if the passed context would be allocated the given height. The same as GtkCellAreaClass.get_preferred_height_for_width() only for handling requests in the GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_WIDTH_FOR_HEIGHT mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果为传递的 context 分配了给定的高度，则计算该区域的最小和自然宽度。与 GtkCellAreaClass.get_preferred_height_for_width() 相同，仅用于在 GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_WIDTH_FOR_HEIGHT 模式下处理请求。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the minimum and natural width of the areas cells with the current attributes applied while considering the particular layouting details of the said GtkCellArea. While requests are performed over a series of rows, alignments and overall minimum and natural sizes should be stored in the corresponding GtkCellAreaContext.
trans-unit.target: 在考虑所述GtkCellArea的特定布局细节的同时，使用当前属性计算区域单元的最小和自然宽度。在一系列行上执行请求时，应将对齐方式以及整体的最小和自然大小存储在相应的GtkCellAreaContext中。

trans-unit.source: Call gtk_drawing_area_set_draw_func() to handle redrawing the contents of the widget.
trans-unit.target: 调用 gtk_drawing_area_set_draw_func() 处理重画窗口小部件的内容。

trans-unit.source: Call this function before using any other GTK functions in your GUI applications. It will initialize everything needed to operate the toolkit and parses some standard command line options.
trans-unit.target: 在您的GUI应用程序中使用任何其他GTK函数之前调用这个函数。它将初始化操作工具包所需的一切,并解析一些标准的命令行选项。

trans-unit.source: Call this function to set the expand flag if you would like your widget to become larger horizontally when the window has extra room.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想让您的小组件在窗口有额外空间时水平变大,请调用此函数来设置展开标志。

trans-unit.source: Call this function when the result of the filter function on the box is changed due ot an external factor. For instance, this would be used if the filter function just looked for a specific search term, and the entry with the string has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当 box 上的过滤器功能的结果由于外部因素而改变时，请调用此函数。例如，如果过滤器功能只是在寻找特定的搜索词，并且带有字符串的条目已更改，则将使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Call this function with a setting of TRUE to display an arrow in the header button indicating the column is sorted. Call gtk_tree_view_column_set_sort_order() to change the direction of the arrow.
trans-unit.target: setting 为 TRUE 时调用此函数，以在标题按钮中显示一个箭头，指示该列已排序。调用 gtk_tree_view_column_set_sort_order() 更改箭头的方向。

trans-unit.source: Call this when the result of a print operation is GTK_PRINT_OPERATION_RESULT_ERROR, either as returned by gtk_print_operation_run(), or in the “done” signal handler. The returned GError will contain more details on what went wrong.
trans-unit.target: 调用此当打印操作的结果是 GTK_PRINT_OPERATION_RESULT_ERROR ，无论是作为由归国 gtk_print_operation_run() 的，或“完成”信号处理程序。返回的GError将包含有关发生问题的更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Call this when the result of the sort function on box is changed due to an external factor.
trans-unit.target: 当 box 上的排序函数的结果由于外部因素而更改时，请调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Callback called by gtk_expression_watch() when the expression value changes.
trans-unit.target: 表达式值更改时，由 gtk_expression_watch() 调用的回调。

trans-unit.source: Callback type for adding a function to update animations. See gtk_widget_add_tick_callback().
trans-unit.target: 回调类型，用于添加更新动画的功能。参见 gtk_widget_add_tick_callback() 。

trans-unit.source: Called by GtkMediaStream implementations to advertise the stream being ready to play and providing details about the stream.
trans-unit.target: 由GtkMediaStream实现调用，以通告准备播放的流并提供有关该流的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Called by users to attach the media stream to a GdkSurface they manage. The stream can then access the resources of surface for its rendering purposes. In particular, media streams might want to create GdkGLContexts or sync to the GdkFrameClock.
trans-unit.target: 由用户调用以将媒体流附加到他们管理的GdkSurface。然后，流可以出于其渲染目的访问 surface 资源。特别是，媒体流可能要创建GdkGLContexts或同步到GdkFrameClock。

trans-unit.source: Called for each custom tag handled by the buildable when the builder finishes parsing (see custom_tag_start )
trans-unit.target: 当构建器完成解析时，为可构建对象处理的每个自定义标签调用（请参见 custom_tag_start ）

trans-unit.source: Called for flow boxes that are bound to a GListModel with gtk_flow_box_bind_model() for each item that gets added to the model.
trans-unit.target: 为要添加到模型中的每个项目，调用通过 gtk_flow_box_bind_model() 绑定到GListModel的流框。

trans-unit.source: Called for list boxes that are bound to a GListModel with gtk_list_box_bind_model() for each item that gets added to the model.
trans-unit.target: 对于要添加到模型中的每个项目，调用通过 gtk_list_box_bind_model() 绑定到GListModel的列表框。

trans-unit.source: Called for the end tag of each custom element that is handled by the buildable (see custom_tag_start ).
trans-unit.target: 调用由buildable处理的每个自定义元素的结束标记（请参见 custom_tag_start ）。

trans-unit.source: Called this function on an already showing popup with a new autohide value different from the current one, will cause the popup to be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 在一个已经显示的弹出窗口上调用此函数,并设置一个与当前不同的新的自动隐藏值,将使该弹出窗口被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Called to activate the content of the GtkCellRenderer.
trans-unit.target: 调用以激活GtkCellRenderer的内容。

trans-unit.source: Called to get a renderer’s natural height for width.
trans-unit.target: 调用以获取渲染器的自然高度作为宽度。

trans-unit.source: Called to get a renderer’s natural height.
trans-unit.target: 调用以获取渲染器的自然高度。

trans-unit.source: Called to get a renderer’s natural width for height.
trans-unit.target: 调用以获取渲染器的自然高度宽度。

trans-unit.source: Called to get a renderer’s natural width.
trans-unit.target: 调用以获取渲染器的自然宽度。

trans-unit.source: Called to get the aligned area used by cell inside cell_area .
trans-unit.target: 调用以获取 cell_area 内 cell 使用的对齐区域。

trans-unit.source: Called to get the request mode, if the widget does not have a layout manager. This allows a widget to tell its parent container whether it prefers to be allocated in GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_HEIGHT_FOR_WIDTH or GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_WIDTH_FOR_HEIGHT mode. GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_HEIGHT_FOR_WIDTH means the widget prefers to have GtkWidgetClass.measure() called first to get the default width (passing a for_size of -1), then again to get the height for said default width. GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_CONSTANT_SIZE disables any height-for-width or width-for-height geometry management for said widget and is the default return. It’s important to note that any widget which trades height-for-width or width-for-height must respond properly to a for_size value >= -1 passed to GtkWidgetClass.measure, for both possible orientations.
trans-unit.target: 如果窗口小部件没有布局管理器，则调用以获取请求模式。这使小部件可以告诉其父容器，它是否更喜欢以 GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_HEIGHT_FOR_WIDTH 或 GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_WIDTH_FOR_HEIGHT 模式分配。 GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_HEIGHT_FOR_WIDTH 意味着该窗口小部件更喜欢首先调用 GtkWidgetClass.measure() 以获取默认宽度（传递for_size -1），然后再次获取该默认宽度的高度。 GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_CONSTANT_SIZE 禁用该窗口小部件的任何以宽度为单位的高度或以宽度为单位的几何图形管理，这是默认返回值。重要的是要注意，任何以高度换宽度或宽度换高度的小部件都必须对传递给GtkWidgetClass.measure的for_size值> = -1做出正确响应，以适应两种可能的方向。

trans-unit.source: Called to gets whether the cell renderer prefers a height-for-width layout or a width-for-height layout.
trans-unit.target: 调用来获取单元格渲染器是喜欢高度换宽度的布局还是宽度换高度的布局。

trans-unit.source: Called to indicate that the buffer operations between here and a call to gtk_text_buffer_end_user_action() are part of a single user-visible operation. The operations between gtk_text_buffer_begin_user_action() and gtk_text_buffer_end_user_action() can then be grouped when creating an undo stack. GtkTextBuffer maintains a count of calls to gtk_text_buffer_begin_user_action() that have not been closed with a call to gtk_text_buffer_end_user_action(), and emits the “begin-user-action” and “end-user-action” signals only for the outermost pair of calls. This allows you to build user actions from other user actions.
trans-unit.target: 调用以指示此处和对 gtk_text_buffer_end_user_action() 的调用之间的缓冲区操作是单个用户可见操作的一部分。然后，在创建撤消堆栈时，可以将 gtk_text_buffer_begin_user_action() 和 gtk_text_buffer_end_user_action() 之间的操作分组。GtkTextBuffer维护了对 gtk_text_buffer_begin_user_action() 的调用计数，这些调用尚未通过对 gtk_text_buffer_end_user_action() 的调用关闭，并且仅针对最外面的一对调用发出“ begin-user-action”和“ end-user-action”信号。这使您可以从其他用户操作中构建用户操作。

trans-unit.source: Called to initiate editing the content of the GtkCellRenderer.
trans-unit.target: 调用以开始编辑GtkCellRenderer的内容。

trans-unit.source: Called to obtain the minimum and natural size of the widget, if the widget does not have a layout manager. Depending on the orientation parameter, the passed for_size can be interpreted as width or height. A widget will never be allocated less than its minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果小组件没有布局管理器,则调用该函数以获取小组件的最小和自然尺寸。根据方向参数,传递的for_size可以解释为宽度或高度。小组件的最小尺寸永远不会小于它的最小尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Called to set the allocation, if the widget does not have a layout manager.
trans-unit.target: 如果小组件没有布局管理器,则调用该函数来设置分配。

trans-unit.source: Called to snapshot the content of the GtkCellRenderer.
trans-unit.target: 调用以快照GtkCellRenderer的内容。

trans-unit.source: Called via gtk_im_context_filter_keypress() on every key press or release event. Every non-trivial input method needs to override this in order to implement the mapping from key events to text. A return value of TRUE indicates to the caller that the event was consumed by the input method. In that case, the “commit” signal should be emitted upon completion of a key sequence to pass the resulting text back to the input widget. Alternatively, FALSE may be returned to indicate that the event wasn’t handled by the input method. If a builtin mapping exists for the key, it is used to produce a character.
trans-unit.target: 在每次按键或释放事件时通过 gtk_im_context_filter_keypress() 调用。每个非平凡的输入方法都需要重写此方法，以实现从键事件到文本的映射。返回值 TRUE 向调用方指示该事件已由输入方法使用。在这种情况下，应在完成键序列后发出“提交”信号，以将结果文本传递回输入小部件。或者，可以返回 FALSE 来指示该事件未由输入方法处理。如果该键存在内置映射，则将其用于生成字符。

trans-unit.source: Called via gtk_im_context_focus_in() when the input widget has gained focus. May be overridden to keep track of the current focus.
trans-unit.target: 当输入窗口小部件获得焦点时，通过 gtk_im_context_focus_in() 调用。可以重写以跟踪当前的焦点。

trans-unit.source: Called via gtk_im_context_focus_out() when the input widget has lost focus. May be overridden to keep track of the current focus.
trans-unit.target: 当输入窗口小部件失去焦点时，通过 gtk_im_context_focus_out() 调用。可以重写以跟踪当前的焦点。

trans-unit.source: Called via gtk_im_context_get_preedit_string() to retrieve the text currently being preedited for display at the cursor position. Any input method which composes complex characters or any other compositions from multiple sequential key presses should override this method to provide feedback.
trans-unit.target: 通过 gtk_im_context_get_preedit_string() 进行调用，以检索当前正在预编辑的文本，以显示在光标位置。任何由多个连续按键组成的复杂字符或其他任何组合的输入法都应覆盖此方法以提供反馈。

trans-unit.source: Called via gtk_im_context_get_surrounding() to update the context around the cursor location. It is not necessary to override this method even with input methods which implement context-dependent behavior. The base implementation emits “retrieve-surrounding” and records the context received by the subsequent invocation of get_surrounding .
trans-unit.target: 通过 gtk_im_context_get_surrounding() 调用以更新光标位置周围的上下文。即使使用实现上下文相关行为的输入方法，也不必重写此方法。基本实现发出“ retrieve-surrounding”并记录随后调用 get_surrounding 所接收的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Called via gtk_im_context_reset() to signal a change such as a change in cursor position. An input method that implements preediting should override this method to clear the preedit state on reset.
trans-unit.target: 通过 gtk_im_context_reset() 进行调用，以发出更改（例如光标位置更改）的信号。实现预编辑的输入方法应覆盖此方法，以在重置时清除预编辑状态。

trans-unit.source: Called via gtk_im_context_set_client_widget() when the input window where the entered text will appear changes. Override this to keep track of the current input window, for instance for the purpose of positioning a status display of your input method.
trans-unit.target: 当显示输入文本的输入窗口发生更改时，通过 gtk_im_context_set_client_widget() 调用。覆盖此位置以跟踪当前输入窗口，例如，为了放置输入法的状态显示。

trans-unit.source: Called via gtk_im_context_set_cursor_location() to inform the input method of the current cursor location relative to the client window. May be overridden to implement the display of popup windows at the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 通过 gtk_im_context_set_cursor_location() 调用，以将当前光标相对于客户端窗口的位置通知输入方法。可以重写以实现在光标位置显示弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: Called via gtk_im_context_set_surrounding() in response to signal “retrieve-surrounding” to update the input method’s idea of the context around the cursor. It is not necessary to override this method even with input methods which implement context-dependent behavior. The base implementation is sufficient for gtk_im_context_get_surrounding() to work.
trans-unit.target: 通过 gtk_im_context_set_surrounding() 调用，以响应信号“ retrieve-surrounding”，以更新输入法对光标周围环境的想法。即使使用实现上下文相关行为的输入方法，也不必重写此方法。基本实现足以使 gtk_im_context_get_surrounding() 工作。

trans-unit.source: Called via gtk_im_context_set_use_preedit() to control the use of the preedit string. Override this to display feedback by some other means if turned off.
trans-unit.target: 通过 gtk_im_context_set_use_preedit() 调用以控制预编辑字符串的使用。如果关闭此功能，则可以通过其他某种方式显示此反馈。

trans-unit.source: Called when a builder finishes the parsing of a UI definition. It is normally not necessary to implement this, unless you need to perform special cleanup actions. GtkWindow sets the “visible” property here.
trans-unit.target: 当构建器完成UI定义的解析时调用。通常没有必要执行此操作，除非您需要执行特殊的清理操作。GtkWindow在此处设置“ visible”属性。

trans-unit.source: Called when the widget gets added to a GtkRoot widget. Must chain up
trans-unit.target: 在将小部件添加到GtkRoot小部件时调用。必须连锁

trans-unit.source: Called when the widget is about to be removed from its GtkRoot widget. Must chain up
trans-unit.target: 当小部件即将从其GtkRoot小部件中删除时调用。必须连锁

trans-unit.source: Calling gtk_widget_grab_focus() on an already focused widget is allowed, should not have an effect, and return TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 允许在已经聚焦的窗口小部件上调用 gtk_widget_grab_focus() ，但不应产生效果，并返回 TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: Calling gtk_list_store_insert_with_values (list_store, iter, position...) has the same effect as calling
trans-unit.target: 调用 gtk_list_store_insert_with_values (list_store, iter, position...) 与调用具有相同的效果

trans-unit.source: Calling gtk_tree_store_insert_with_values (tree_store, iter, position, ...) has the same effect as calling
trans-unit.target: 调用 gtk_tree_store_insert_with_values (tree_store, iter, position, ...) 与调用具有相同的效果

trans-unit.source: Calling this function for the first time has the side effect of removing the default color and gray palettes from the color chooser.
trans-unit.target: 第一次调用这个函数,有一个副作用,就是把默认的颜色和灰色调色板从颜色选择器中删除。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function is only necessary if you want to add custom callbacks via gtk_builder_cscope_add_callback_symbol().
trans-unit.target: 仅当您要通过 gtk_builder_cscope_add_callback_symbol() 添加自定义回调时，才需要调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function requires 2 calls to gtk_snapshot_pop().
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数需要对 gtk_snapshot_pop() 进行2次调用。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function requires 2 subsequent calls to gtk_snapshot_pop().
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数需要2次后续调用 gtk_snapshot_pop() 。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function will enable extra internal bookkeeping to track children and emit signals on the returned listmodel. It may slow down operations a lot.
trans-unit.target: 调用这个函数将启用额外的内部记账来跟踪子代,并在返回的listmodel上发出信号。它可能会使操作速度减慢很多。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function will enable extra internal bookkeeping to track constraints and emit signals on the returned listmodel. It may slow down operations a lot.
trans-unit.target: 调用这个函数将启用额外的内部记账来跟踪约束,并在返回的listmodel上发出信号。它可能会使操作速度减慢很多。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function will enable extra internal bookkeeping to track controllers and emit signals on the returned listmodel. It may slow down operations a lot.
trans-unit.target: 调用这个函数将启用额外的内部记账来跟踪控制器,并在返回的listmodel上发出信号。它可能会使操作速度减慢很多。

trans-unit.source: Calling this function will enable extra internal bookkeeping to track guides and emit signals on the returned listmodel. It may slow down operations a lot.
trans-unit.target: 调用这个函数将启用额外的内部记账来跟踪指南,并在返回的listmodel上发出信号。它可能会使操作速度减慢很多。

trans-unit.source: Calls gtk_text_buffer_insert_interactive() at the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 在光标位置调用 gtk_text_buffer_insert_interactive() 。

trans-unit.source: Calls gtk_text_iter_backward_sentence_start() up to count times, or until it returns FALSE. If count is negative, moves forward instead of backward.
trans-unit.target: 最多调用 gtk_text_iter_backward_sentence_start() 进行 count ，或者直到返回 FALSE 为止。如果 count 为负，则向前移动而不是向后移动。

trans-unit.source: Calls gtk_text_iter_backward_visible_word_start() up to count times.
trans-unit.target: 最多调用 gtk_text_iter_backward_visible_word_start() 进行 count 。

trans-unit.source: Calls gtk_text_iter_backward_word_start() up to count times.
trans-unit.target: 最多调用 gtk_text_iter_backward_word_start() 进行 count 。

trans-unit.source: Calls gtk_text_iter_forward_sentence_end()count times (or until gtk_text_iter_forward_sentence_end() returns FALSE). If count is negative, moves backward instead of forward.
trans-unit.target: 调用 gtk_text_iter_forward_sentence_end() count 次数（或直到 gtk_text_iter_forward_sentence_end() 返回 FALSE ）。如果 count 为负，则向后移动而不是向前移动。

trans-unit.source: Calls gtk_text_iter_forward_visible_word_end() up to count times.
trans-unit.target: 最多调用 gtk_text_iter_forward_visible_word_end() 进行 count 。

trans-unit.source: Calls gtk_text_iter_forward_word_end() up to count times.
trans-unit.target: 最多调用 gtk_text_iter_forward_word_end() 进行 count 。

trans-unit.source: Calls gtk_text_tag_table_lookup() on the buffer’s tag table to get a GtkTextTag, then calls gtk_text_buffer_apply_tag().
trans-unit.target: 在缓冲区的标签表上调用 gtk_text_tag_table_lookup() 以获取GtkTextTag，然后调用 gtk_text_buffer_apply_tag() 。

trans-unit.source: Calls gtk_text_tag_table_lookup() on the buffer’s tag table to get a GtkTextTag, then calls gtk_text_buffer_remove_tag().
trans-unit.target: 在缓冲区的标签表上调用 gtk_text_tag_table_lookup() 以获取GtkTextTag，然后调用 gtk_text_buffer_remove_tag() 。

trans-unit.source: Calls gtk_widget_set_sensitive (widget, @setting) for each widget in the dialog’s action area with the given response_id . A convenient way to sensitize/desensitize dialog buttons.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的 response_id 为对话框的操作区域中的每个小部件调用 gtk_widget_set_sensitive (widget, @setting) 。激活/取消激活对话框按钮的便捷方法。

trans-unit.source: Calls callback for every GtkCellRenderer in area .
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 callback ，每GtkCellRenderer的 area 。

trans-unit.source: Calls callback for every GtkCellRenderer in area with the allocated rectangle inside cell_area .
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 callback ，每GtkCellRenderer在 area 与分配的矩形内 cell_area 。

trans-unit.source: Calls func for each key-value pair of settings .
trans-unit.target: 为每个键值对 settings 调用 func 。

trans-unit.source: Calls func on all expanded rows.
trans-unit.target: 在所有展开的行上调用 func 。

trans-unit.source: Calls func on each tag in table , with user data data . Note that the table may not be modified while iterating over it (you can’t add/remove tags).
trans-unit.target: 使用用户数据 data 在 table 每个标签上调用 func 。请注意，在迭代表时，可能无法对其进行修改（您无法添加/删除标签）。

trans-unit.source: Calls a function for all GtkPrinters. If func returns TRUE, the enumeration is stopped.
trans-unit.target: 为所有GtkPrinters调用一个函数。如果 func 返回 TRUE ，则枚举将停止。

trans-unit.source: Calls a function for each selected child.
trans-unit.target: 为每个选定的子代调用一个函数。

trans-unit.source: Calls a function for each selected icon. Note that the model or selection cannot be modified from within this function.
trans-unit.target: 调用每个选定图标的函数。请注意,模型或选择不能在此函数中修改。

trans-unit.source: Calls a function for each selected node. Note that you cannot modify the tree or selection from within this function. As a result, gtk_tree_selection_get_selected_rows() might be more useful.
trans-unit.target: 为每个选定节点调用一个函数。请注意，您无法在此功能中修改树或选择。结果， gtk_tree_selection_get_selected_rows() 可能会更有用。

trans-unit.source: Calls func on each node in model in a depth-first fashion.
trans-unit.target: 以深度优先的方式调用模型中每个节点的func。

trans-unit.source: Calls gtk_widget_set_sensitive (widget, setting) for each widget in the info bars’s action area with the given response_id. A convenient way to sensitize/desensitize dialog buttons.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的response_id为信息栏的操作区域中的每个窗口小部件调用gtk_widget_set_sensitive（窗口小部件，设置）。激活/取消激活对话框按钮的便捷方法。

trans-unit.source: Calls the GtkCellAllocCallback function on every GtkCellRenderer in the area with the allocated area for the cell and the provided user data until the callback returns TRUE.
trans-unit.target: 在该区域的每个GtkCellRenderer上调用GtkCellAllocCallback函数，该区域具有为该单元分配的区域和提供的用户数据，直到回调返回 TRUE 为止。

trans-unit.source: Cancels a currently ongoing drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消当前正在进行的拖动操作。

trans-unit.source: Cancels a running print operation. This function may be called from a “begin-print”, “paginate” or “draw-page” signal handler to stop the currently running print operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消正在运行的打印操作。可以从“ begin-print”，“ paginate”或“ draw-page”信号处理程序中调用此函数，以停止当前正在运行的打印操作。

trans-unit.source: Capabilities the application can handle.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以处理的能力。

trans-unit.source: Cause the “row-activated” signal to be emitted on a single click instead of a double click.
trans-unit.target: 导致单击而不是双击发出“行激活”信号。

trans-unit.source: Causes entry to have keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 使 entry 具有键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: Causes self to have keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 使 self 具有键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: Causes widget (or one of its descendents) to have the keyboard focus for the GtkWindow it's inside.
trans-unit.target: 使 widget （或其子孙之一）具有位于其内部的GtkWindow的键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: Causes widget to have the keyboard focus for the GtkWindow it’s inside.
trans-unit.target: 使 widget 在其内部的GtkWindow具有键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: Causes the “item-activated” signal to be emitted on a single click instead of a double click.
trans-unit.target: 导致单击一次而不是双击发出“项目激活”信号。

trans-unit.source: Causes the entry’s progress indicator to “fill in” the given fraction of the bar. The fraction should be between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 使条目的进度指示器“填充”栏的给定部分。分数应在0.0到1.0之间（包括0.0和1.0）。

trans-unit.source: Causes the given text to appear next to the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 使给定的 text 显示在进度条旁边。

trans-unit.source: Causes the minimum and/or natural height to grow if the new proposed sizes exceed the current minimum and natural height.
trans-unit.target: 如果新提出的尺寸超过了当前的最小和自然高度,则会导致最小和/或自然高度增加。

trans-unit.source: Causes the minimum and/or natural width to grow if the new proposed sizes exceed the current minimum and natural width.
trans-unit.target: 如果新提出的尺寸超过了当前的最小和自然宽度,会导致最小和/或自然宽度增加。

trans-unit.source: Causes the progress bar to “fill in” the given fraction of the bar. The fraction should be between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 使进度条“填充”栏的给定部分。分数应在0.0到1.0之间（包括0.0和1.0）。

trans-unit.source: Cell Properties
trans-unit.target: 细胞属性

trans-unit.source: Cell background as a GdkRGBA
trans-unit.target: 单元格背景作为GdkRGBA

trans-unit.source: Cell background color as a string.
trans-unit.target: 单元格背景颜色为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Cell renderers are used to draw the data in the tree model in a way. There are a number of cell renderers that come with GTK, including the GtkCellRendererText, GtkCellRendererPixbuf and the GtkCellRendererToggle. It is relatively easy to write a custom renderer.
trans-unit.target: 单元格渲染器用于以某种方式在树模型中绘制数据。GTK随附许多单元格渲染器，包括GtkCellRendererText，GtkCellRendererPixbuf和GtkCellRendererToggle。编写自定义渲染器相对容易。

trans-unit.source: Center the baseline
trans-unit.target: 对中基线

trans-unit.source: Change by a specified amount.
trans-unit.target: 按规定的金额改变。

trans-unit.source: Changes self by removing n_removals strings and adding additions to it.
trans-unit.target: 通过删除 n_removals 字符串并向其添加 additions 来更改 self 。

trans-unit.source: Changes that need to be done at the time of the switch
trans-unit.target: 切换时需要做的改变。

trans-unit.source: Changes the GtkTextView overwrite mode.
trans-unit.target: 更改GtkTextView覆盖模式。

trans-unit.source: Changes the active row of combo_box to the one that has an ID equal to active_id , or unsets the active row if active_id is NULL. Rows having a NULL ID string cannot be made active by this function.
trans-unit.target: 将 combo_box 的活动行更改为ID等于 active_id 的活动行，或者如果 active_id 为 NULL 则取消设置活动行。具有 NULL ID字符串的行不能通过此函数激活。

trans-unit.source: Changes the appearance of the sort indicator.
trans-unit.target: 改变排序指标的外观。

trans-unit.source: Changes the dimensions of a size to width x height .
trans-unit.target: 将 size 的尺寸更改为 width x height 。

trans-unit.source: Changes the frame drawn around the contents of scrolled_window .
trans-unit.target: 更改围绕 scrolled_window 的内容绘制的框架。

trans-unit.source: Changes the location of a recently used resource from uri to new_uri .
trans-unit.target: 将最近使用的资源的位置从 uri 更改为 new_uri 。

trans-unit.source: Changes the menu label for the page containing child .
trans-unit.target: 更改包含 child 的页面的菜单标签。

trans-unit.source: Changes the properties of an existing spin button. The adjustment, climb rate, and number of decimal places are updated accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 更改现有旋转按钮的属性。调整、爬升率和小数点位数都会相应更新。

trans-unit.source: Changes the size request of the editable to be about the right size for n_chars characters.
trans-unit.target: 将可编辑内容的大小要求更改为大约 n_chars 个字符的大小。

trans-unit.source: Changes the state of self to the desired one.
trans-unit.target: 将 self 状态更改为所需状态。

trans-unit.source: Changes the tab label for child . If NULL is specified for tab_label , then the page will have the label “page N”.
trans-unit.target: 更改 child 的选项卡标签。如果为 tab_label 指定 NULL ，则页面将具有标签“ page N”。

trans-unit.source: Changes to consider after the switch
trans-unit.target: 转换后需要考虑的变化

trans-unit.source: Check if no value is contained in bitset.
trans-unit.target: 检查bitset中是否没有值。

trans-unit.source: Check menu item
trans-unit.target: 检查菜单项目

trans-unit.source: Checks if area contains renderer .
trans-unit.target: 检查 area 包含 renderer 。

trans-unit.source: Checks if iter points to a valid value.
trans-unit.target: 检查 iter 是否指向有效值。

trans-unit.source: Checks if trigger1 and trigger2 trigger under the same conditions.
trans-unit.target: 检查 trigger1 和 trigger2 是否在相同条件下触发。

trans-unit.source: Checks if a list item has been set to be activatable via gtk_list_item_set_activatable().
trans-unit.target: 检查是否已通过 gtk_list_item_set_activatable() 将列表项设置为可激活。

trans-unit.source: Checks if a list item has been set to be selectable via gtk_list_item_set_selectable().
trans-unit.target: 检查是否已通过 gtk_list_item_set_selectable() 将列表项设置为可选择的。

trans-unit.source: Checks if a map function is currently set on self
trans-unit.target: 检查当前是否在 self 设置了地图功能

trans-unit.source: Checks if a row can be expanded. This does not mean that the row is actually expanded, this can be checked with gtk_tree_list_row_get_expanded()
trans-unit.target: 检查行是否可以扩展。这并不意味着该行实际上已展开，可以使用 gtk_tree_list_row_get_expanded() 进行检查

trans-unit.source: Checks if a stream may be seekable.
trans-unit.target: 检查一个流是否可以寻找。

trans-unit.source: Checks if autoselect has been enabled or disabled via gtk_single_selection_set_autoselect().
trans-unit.target: 检查是否通过 gtk_single_selection_set_autoselect() 启用或禁用了自动选择。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the expression is static.
trans-unit.target: 检查表达式是否是静态的。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the given event triggers self .
trans-unit.target: 检查给定 event 触发 self 。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the given item is matched by the filter or not.
trans-unit.target: 检查给定 item 是否与过滤器匹配。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the given value has been added to bitset
trans-unit.target: 检查给定 value 是否已添加 bitset

trans-unit.source: Checks if the given item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 确认是否选择了指定的项目。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the given iter is a valid iter for this GtkListStore.
trans-unit.target: 检查给定的iter是否是此GtkListStore的有效iter 。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the given iter is a valid iter for this GtkTreeModelSort.
trans-unit.target: 检查给定的iter是否是此GtkTreeModelSort的有效iter 。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the given iter is a valid iter for this GtkTreeStore.
trans-unit.target: 检查给定的iter是否是此GtkTreeStore的有效iter 。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the icon is symbolic or not. This currently uses only the file name and not the file contents for determining this. This behaviour may change in the future.
trans-unit.target: 检查图标是否为符号。目前只使用文件名而不是文件内容来确定。这种行为将来可能会改变。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the item is displayed as selected. The selected state is maintained by the container and its list model and cannot be set otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 检查项目是否显示为选中。选定的状态由容器及其列表模型保持,否则无法设置。

trans-unit.source: Checks if there is currently a seek operation going on.
trans-unit.target: 检查当前是否有寻找操作正在进行。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the GTK library in use is compatible with the given version. Generally you would pass in the constants GTK_MAJOR_VERSION, GTK_MINOR_VERSION, GTK_MICRO_VERSION as the three arguments to this function; that produces a check that the library in use is compatible with the version of GTK the application or module was compiled against.
trans-unit.target: 检查所使用的GTK库是否与给定版本兼容。通常，您将传入常量 GTK_MAJOR_VERSION ， GTK_MINOR_VERSION ， GTK_MICRO_VERSION 作为此函数的三个参数。会检查使用中的库是否与应用程序或模块所针对的GTK版本兼容。

trans-unit.source: Checks to see if a mouse drag starting at (start_x , start_y ) and ending at (current_x , current_y ) has passed the GTK drag threshold, and thus should trigger the beginning of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 检查从（ start_x ， start_y ）开始到（ current_x ， current_y ）结束的鼠标拖动是否已超过GTK拖动阈值，因此应触发拖放操作的开始。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether group_name appears inside the groups registered for the recently used item info .
trans-unit.target: 检查 group_name 是否出现在为最近使用的项目 info 注册的组内。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether iter falls in the range [start , end ). start and end must be in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 检查 iter 是否落在[ start ， end ）范围内。 start 和 end 必须按升序排列。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether a GtkAccessible implementation has its accessible property set to the expected value, and raises an assertion if the condition is not satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 检查GtkAccessible实现是否将其accessible属性设置为期望值，如果不满足条件，则引发一个断言。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether a GtkAccessible implementation has its accessible relation set to the expected value, and raises an assertion if the condition is not satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 检查GtkAccessible实现是否将其可访问关系设置为期望值，如果不满足条件，则引发一个断言。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether a GtkAccessible implementation has its accessible state set to the expected value, and raises an assertion if the condition is not satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 检查GtkAccessible实现是否将其可访问状态设置为期望值，如果不满足条件，则引发一个断言。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether a GtkAccessible implementation has the given role , and raises an assertion if the condition is failed.
trans-unit.target: 检查GtkAccessible实现是否具有给定 role ，如果条件失败，则引发一个断言。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether all columns of grid should have the same width.
trans-unit.target: 检查 grid 所有列是否应具有相同的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether all rows of grid should have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 检查 grid 所有行是否应具有相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether an application registered this resource using app_name .
trans-unit.target: 检查应用程序是否使用 app_name 注册了此资源。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether an icon theme includes an icon for a particular name.
trans-unit.target: 确认一个图标主题是否包含一个特定名称的图标。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the “accessible-role” of the accessible is role .
trans-unit.target: 检查可访问性的“可访问角色”是否为 role 。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the GtkAccessible has property set.
trans-unit.target: 检查GtkAccessible是否设置了 property 。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the GtkAccessible has relation set.
trans-unit.target: 检查GtkAccessible是否设置了 relation 。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the GtkAccessible has state set.
trans-unit.target: 检查GtkAccessible是否设置了 state 。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the constraint describes a relation between an attribute on the “target” and a constant value.
trans-unit.target: 检查 constraint 是否描述了“目标”上的属性与常数值之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the constraint is a required relation for solving the constraint layout.
trans-unit.target: 检查 constraint 是否是解决约束布局的必需关系。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the constraint is attached to a GtkConstraintLayout, and it is contributing to the layout.
trans-unit.target: 检查 constraint 是否附加到GtkConstraintLayout，它是否对布局起作用。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the accessible property of accessible is set to a specific value.
trans-unit.target: 检查是否访问 property 的 accessible 被设置为特定值。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the accessible relation of accessible is set to a specific value.
trans-unit.target: 检查是否访问 relation 的 accessible 被设定为一个特定的值。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the accessible state of accessible is set to a specific value.
trans-unit.target: 检查accessible的 accessible 访问 state 是否设置为特定值。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the cell renderer can do something when activated.
trans-unit.target: 确认单元格渲染器在激活时是否可以做一些事情。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the given GtkCellRenderer is an expander.
trans-unit.target: 检查给定的GtkCellRenderer是否是扩展器。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the given GtkCellRenderer is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 检查给定的GtkCellRenderer是否扩展。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the resource is local or not by looking at the scheme of its URI.
trans-unit.target: 通过查看URI的方案来检查资源是否为本地资源。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the resource pointed by info still exists. At the moment this check is done only on resources pointing to local files.
trans-unit.target: 检查 info 指向的资源是否仍然存在。目前，仅在指向本地文件的资源上​​执行此检查。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether there is a recently used resource registered with uri inside the recent manager.
trans-unit.target: 检查在最近的管理员中是否有向 uri 注册的最近使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether two GtkRecentInfo point to the same resource.
trans-unit.target: 检查两个GtkRecentInfo是否指向同一资源。

trans-unit.source: Child Properties
trans-unit.target: 子属性

trans-unit.source: Child Property Details
trans-unit.target: 孩子的财产细节

trans-unit.source: Child model to take slice from
trans-unit.target: 儿童模特儿取片

trans-unit.source: Child widgets are added to the panes of the widget with gtk_paned_set_start_child() and gtk_paned_set_end_child(). The division between the two children is set by default from the size requests of the children, but it can be adjusted by the user.
trans-unit.target: 子窗口小部件通过 gtk_paned_set_start_child() 和 gtk_paned_set_end_child() 添加到窗口小部件的窗格中。默认情况下，两个孩子之间的划分是根据孩子的大小要求设置的，但用户可以调整。

trans-unit.source: Children are added using gtk_grid_attach(). They can span multiple rows or columns. It is also possible to add a child next to an existing child, using gtk_grid_attach_next_to(). To remove a child from the grid, use gtk_grid_remove(). The behaviour of GtkGrid when several children occupy the same grid cell is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_grid_attach() 添加子项。它们可以跨越多行或多列。也可以使用 gtk_grid_attach_next_to() 在现有子项旁边添加一个子项。要从网格中删除子级，请使用 gtk_grid_remove() 。GtkGrid在多个子项占据同一个网格单元时的行为是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: Children have an "attach point" defined by the horizontal and vertical index of the cell they occupy; children can span multiple rows or columns. The layout properties for setting the attach points and spans are set using the GtkGridLayoutChild associated to each child widget.
trans-unit.target: 子项具有一个“附着点”，该“附着点”由它们所占据的单元格的水平和垂直索引来定义；孩子可以跨越多行或多列。使用与每个子小部件关联的GtkGridLayoutChild设置用于设置连接点和跨度的布局属性。

trans-unit.source: Children that are placed in this column are removed, spanning children that overlap this column have their width reduced by one, and children after the column are moved to the left.
trans-unit.target: 放在这一列中的子代会被删除,与这一列重叠的跨度子代的宽度会减少一个,而这一列之后的子代会向左移动。

trans-unit.source: Children that are placed in this row are removed, spanning children that overlap this row have their height reduced by one, and children below the row are moved up.
trans-unit.target: 放在这一行的孩子会被删除,与这一行重叠的跨度孩子高度减少一个,这一行下面的孩子会被上移。

trans-unit.source: Children which are attached at or below this position are moved one row down. Children which span across this position are grown to span the new row.
trans-unit.target: 连接在这个位置或下面的子代会向下移动一行。跨越这个位置的子代会成长为跨越新的行。

trans-unit.source: Children which are attached at or to the right of this position are moved one column to the right. Children which span across this position are grown to span the new column.
trans-unit.target: 连接在这个位置或右边的子代会向右移动一列。跨越这个位置的子代会成长为跨越新的一列。

trans-unit.source: Choosing from installed applications
trans-unit.target: 从已安装的应用程序中进行选择

trans-unit.source: Choosing the right model
trans-unit.target: 选择正确的模式

trans-unit.source: Class handler for the “activate” signal. The default implementation activates the gtk.activate-default action.
trans-unit.target: “激活”信号的类处理程序。默认实现会激活gtk.activate-default操作。

trans-unit.source: Class handler for the “close-request” signal.
trans-unit.target: “关闭请求”信号的类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Class handler for the “enable-debugging” keybinding signal.
trans-unit.target: “启用调试”键绑定信号的类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Class structure for GtkEntry. All virtual functions have a default implementation. Derived classes may set the virtual function pointers for the signal handlers to NULL, but must keep get_text_area_size and get_frame_size non-NULL; either use the default implementation, or provide a custom one.
trans-unit.target: GtkEntry的类结构。所有虚拟功能均具有默认实现。派生的类可以将信号处理程序的虚拟函数指针设置为 NULL ，但必须使 get_text_area_size 和 get_frame_size 保持非 NULL ；使用默认实现，或提供自定义实现。

trans-unit.source: Class structure for GtkNativeDialog.
trans-unit.target: GtkNativeDialog的类结构。

trans-unit.source: Clear any previously stored information about requested and allocated sizes for the context.
trans-unit.target: 清除之前存储的关于上下文的请求和分配大小的信息。

trans-unit.source: Clears all existing attributes previously set with gtk_cell_layout_set_attributes().
trans-unit.target: 清除以前使用 gtk_cell_layout_set_attributes() 设置的所有现有属性。

trans-unit.source: Clears all existing attributes previously set with gtk_tree_view_column_set_attributes().

trans-unit.source: Compatibility is defined by two things: first the version of the running library is newer than the version required_major.required_minor .required_micro . trans-unit.source: Computes a valid UTF-8 string that can be used as the name of the item in a menu or list. For example, calling this function on an item that refers to “file:///foo/bar.txt” will yield “bar.txt”.
trans-unit.target: 计算可以用作菜单或列表中项目名称的有效UTF-8字符串。例如，在引用“ file：///foo/bar.txt”的项目上调用此函数将产生“ bar.txt”。

trans-unit.source: Computes the bounds for widget in the coordinate space of target . FIXME: Explain what "bounds" are.
trans-unit.target: 在 target 的坐标空间中计算 widget 的边界。FIXME：解释什么是“界限”。

trans-unit.source: Computes the common prefix that is shared by all rows in completion that start with key . If no row matches key , NULL will be returned. Note that a text column must have been set for this function to work, see gtk_entry_completion_set_text_column() for details.
trans-unit.target: 计算可以通过在所有行共享的公共前缀 completion 与启动 key 。如果没有行与 key 匹配，则将返回 NULL 。请注意，必须设置文本列才能使此功能正常工作，有关详细信息，请参见 gtk_entry_completion_set_text_column() 。

trans-unit.source: Computes whether a container should give this widget extra space when possible.
trans-unit.target: 计算容器是否应该在可能的情况下给这个小组件额外的空间。

trans-unit.source: Computes whether a container should give this widget extra space when possible. Containers should check this, rather than looking at gtk_widget_get_hexpand() or gtk_widget_get_vexpand().
trans-unit.target: 计算容器是否应在可能的情况下为此小部件提供额外的空间。容器应该检查这一点，而不是查看 gtk_widget_get_hexpand() 或 gtk_widget_get_vexpand() 。

trans-unit.source: Concretely, gtk_init() is called in the default handler for the “startup” signal. Therefore, GtkApplication subclasses should chain up in their “startup” handler before using any GTK+ API.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，在默认的处理程序中为“启动”信号调用 gtk_init() 。因此，在使用任何GTK + API之前，GtkApplication子类应在其“启动”处理程序中进行链接。

trans-unit.source: Connect a signal handler which returns an allocated string representing path . That string will then be used to set the text in the combo box's entry. The default signal handler uses the text from the GtkComboBox::entry-text-column model column.
trans-unit.target: 连接信号处理程序，该处理程序返回分配的表示 path 的字符串。然后，该字符串将用于设置组合框条目中的文本。默认的信号处理程序使用GtkComboBox :: entry-text-column模型列中的文本。

trans-unit.source: Connect to the “query-tooltip” signal. This signal will be emitted when a tooltip is supposed to be shown. One of the arguments passed to the signal handler is a GtkTooltip object. This is the object that we are about to display as a tooltip, and can be manipulated in your callback using functions like gtk_tooltip_set_icon(). There are functions for setting the tooltip’s markup, setting an image from a named icon, or even putting in a custom widget.
trans-unit.target: 连接到“ query-tooltip”信号。当应该显示工具提示时，将发出此信号。传递给信号处理程序的参数之一是GtkTooltip对象。这是我们将显示为工具提示的对象，可以使用 gtk_tooltip_set_icon() 之类的函数在您的回调中对其进行操作。有一些功能可以设置工具提示的标记，从命名图标设置图像，甚至可以放入自定义窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: Connecting actions to widgets
trans-unit.target: 将动作连接到小组件

trans-unit.source: Connects an attribute to apply values from column for the GtkTreeModel in use.
trans-unit.target: 连接一个 attribute ，以为正在使用的GtkTreeModel应用 column 中的值。

trans-unit.source: Connects the GtkEntry widget passed as the one to be used in this search bar. The entry should be a descendant of the search bar. This is only required if the entry isn’t the direct child of the search bar (as in our main example).
trans-unit.target: 连接作为在此搜索栏中使用的GtkEntry小部件。该条目应该是搜索栏的后代。仅当该条目不是搜索栏的直接子项时才需要（例如在我们的主要示例中）。

trans-unit.source: Consider porting to the new list widgets
trans-unit.target: 考虑移植到新的列表小部件上

trans-unit.source: Consider the example of associating a set of buttons with a GAction with string state in a typical “radio button” situation. Each button will be associated with the same action, but with a different target value for that action. Clicking on a particular button will activate the action with the target of that button, which will typically cause the action’s state to change to that value. Since the action’s state is now equal to the target value of the button, the button will now be rendered as active (and the other buttons, with different targets, rendered inactive).
trans-unit.target: 考虑在典型的“单选按钮”情况下，将一组按钮与具有字符串状态的GAction关联的示例。每个按钮将与相同的动作相关联，但与该动作的目标值不同。单击特定按钮将激活具有该按钮目标的操作，这通常将导致操作状态更改为该值。由于动作的状态现在等于按钮的目标值，因此该按钮现在将被呈现为活动状态（而具有不同目标的其他按钮则呈现为不活动状态）。

trans-unit.source: Considering the default editability of the buffer, and tags that affect editability, determines whether text inserted at iter would be editable. If text inserted at iter would be editable then the user should be allowed to insert text at iter . gtk_text_buffer_insert_interactive() uses this function to decide whether insertions are allowed at a given position.
trans-unit.target: 考虑到缓冲区的默认可编辑性以及影响可编辑性的标签，请确定在 iter 插入的文本是否可编辑。如果在 iter 处插入的文本是可编辑的，则应允许用户在 iter 处插入文本。 gtk_text_buffer_insert_interactive() 使用此函数来确定在给定位置是否允许插入。

trans-unit.source: Constant to return from a signal handler for the “input” signal in case of conversion failure.
trans-unit.target: 在转换失败的情况下从“输入”信号的信号处理程序返回的常数。

trans-unit.source: Constraints are objects defining the relationship between attributes of a widget; you can read the description of the GtkConstraint class to have a more in depth definition.
trans-unit.target: 约束是定义小部件属性之间关系的对象。您可以阅读GtkConstraint类的描述以更深入地定义。

trans-unit.source: Constraints have an implicit "reading order"; you should start describing each edge of each child, as well as their relationship with the parent container, from the top left (or top right, in RTL languages), horizontally first, and then vertically.
trans-unit.target: 约束有一个隐含的 "阅读顺序";你应该从左上角(或RTL语言中的右上角)开始描述每个子容器的每个边缘,以及它们与父容器的关系,先是水平方向,然后是垂直方向。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a child of a buildable that has been specified as “constructor” in the UI definition. This can be used to reference a widget created in a <ui> tag which is outside of the normal GtkBuilder UI definition hierarchy. A reference to the constructed object is returned and becomes owned by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 构造一个在UI定义中指定为“构造函数”的可构建对象的子对象。这可以用来引用在<ui>标记中创建的窗口小部件，该窗口小部件不在常规GtkBuilder UI定义层次结构之内。返回对构造对象的引用，并由调用者拥有。

trans-unit.source: Containers should use gtk_widget_compute_expand() rather than this function, to see whether a widget, or any of its children, has the expand flag set. If any child of a widget wants to expand, the parent may ask to expand also.
trans-unit.target: 容器应使用 gtk_widget_compute_expand() 而不是此函数，以查看小部件或其任何子级是否设置了扩展标志。如果窗口小部件的任何子项要扩展，则父项也可能要求扩展。

trans-unit.source: Contains information found when looking up an icon in an icon theme and supports painting it as a GdkPaintable.
trans-unit.target: 包含在图标主题中查找图标时发现的信息，并支持将其绘制为GdkPaintable。

trans-unit.source: Content is clipped to the bounds of the area. Content outside the area is not drawn and cannot be interacted with.
trans-unit.target: 内容被剪切到区域的边界。区域外的内容不会被绘制,也不能与之交互。

trans-unit.source: Controls how a widget deals with extra space in a single (x or y) dimension.
trans-unit.target: 控制小组件如何处理单一(X 或 Y)维度的额外空间。

trans-unit.source: Controls the direction of the sort indicators in sorted list and tree views. By default an arrow pointing down means the column is sorted in ascending order. When set to TRUE, this order will be inverted.
trans-unit.target: 在排序的列表和树视图中控制排序指示符的方向。默认情况下，向下的箭头表示该列以升序排列。当设置为 TRUE 时，此顺序将被反转。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the action bar shows its contents or not.
trans-unit.target: 控制操作栏是否显示其内容。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the info bar shows its contents or not.
trans-unit.target: 控制信息栏是否显示其内容。

trans-unit.source: Convenience function for setting up the most used case of this code: a completion list with just strings. This function will set up completion to have a list displaying all (and just) strings in the completion list, and to get those strings from column in the model of completion .
trans-unit.target: 设置此代码最常用情况的便捷功能：仅包含字符串的完成列表。此功能将设置 completion 功能，使其具有一个列表，其中显示了完成列表中的所有（和仅）字符串，并从 completion 模型的 column 中获取这些字符串。

trans-unit.source: Convenience function that inserts a new column into the GtkTreeView with the given cell renderer and a GtkTreeCellDataFunc to set cell renderer attributes (normally using data from the model). See also gtk_tree_view_column_set_cell_data_func(), gtk_tree_view_column_pack_start(). If tree_view has “fixed_height” mode enabled, then the new column will have its “sizing” property set to be GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_FIXED.
trans-unit.target: 便捷功能，可使用给定的单元格渲染器将新列插入GtkTreeView中，并使用GtkTreeCellDataFunc设置单元格渲染器属性（通常使用模型中的数据）。另请参见 gtk_tree_view_column_set_cell_data_func() ， gtk_tree_view_column_pack_start() 。如果 tree_view 启用了“ fixed_height”模式，则新列的“ sizing”属性将设置为GTK_TREE_VIEW_COLUMN_FIXED。

trans-unit.source: Convenience function to obtain the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINTER.
trans-unit.target: 便捷函数获取 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINTER 的值。

trans-unit.source: Convenience function to set GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINTER to printer .
trans-unit.target: 方便的功能将 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINTER 设置为 printer 。

trans-unit.source: Convert your ui files
trans-unit.target: 转换您的文件

trans-unit.source: Converts child_path to a path relative to filter . That is, child_path points to a path in the child model. The rerturned path will point to the same row in the filtered model. If child_path isn’t a valid path on the child model or points to a row which is not visible in filter , then NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 将 child_path 转换为相对于 filter 的路径。也就是说， child_path 指向子模型中的路径。返回的路径将指向已过滤模型中的同一行。如果 child_path 在子模型上不是有效路径，或者指向在 filter 中不可见的行，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Converts child_path to a path relative to tree_model_sort . That is, child_path points to a path in the child model. The returned path will point to the same row in the sorted model. If child_path isn’t a valid path on the child model, then NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 将 child_path 转换为相对于 tree_model_sort 的路径。也就是说， child_path 指向子模型中的路径。返回的路径将指向已排序模型中的同一行。如果 child_path 在子模型上不是有效路径，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Converts filter_path to a path on the child model of filter . That is, filter_path points to a location in filter . The returned path will point to the same location in the model not being filtered. If filter_path does not point to a location in the child model, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 将 filter_path 转换为 filter 的子模型上的路径。也就是说， filter_path 指向 filter 中的位置。返回的路径将指向模型中未过滤的相同位置。如果 filter_path 未指向子模型中的位置，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Converts sorted_path to a path on the child model of tree_model_sort . That is, sorted_path points to a location in tree_model_sort . The returned path will point to the same location in the model not being sorted. If sorted_path does not point to a location in the child model, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 将 sorted_path 转换为tree_model_sort子模型上的 tree_model_sort 。也就是说， sorted_path 指向的位置 tree_model_sort 。返回的路径将指向模型中未排序的相同位置。如果 sorted_path 未指向子模型中的位置，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Converts a color from HSV space to RGB.
trans-unit.target: 将颜色从HSV空间转换为RGB。

trans-unit.source: Converts a color from RGB space to HSV.
trans-unit.target: 将颜色从RGB空间转换为HSV。

trans-unit.source: Converts an accelerator keyval and modifier mask into a (possibly translated) string that can be displayed to a user, similarly to gtk_accelerator_get_label(), but handling keycodes.
trans-unit.target: 与 gtk_accelerator_get_label() 类似，将加速器的keyval和修饰符掩码转换为可以显示给用户的（可能是已翻译的）字符串，但要处理键码。

trans-unit.source: Converts an accelerator keyval and modifier mask into a string parseable by gtk_accelerator_parse(). For example, if you pass in GDK_KEY_q and GDK_CONTROL_MASK, this function returns “<Control>q”.
trans-unit.target: 将加速器keyval和修饰符掩码转换为可由 gtk_accelerator_parse() 解析的字符串。例如，如果您传入GDK_KEY_q和GDK_CONTROL_MASK，则此函数返回“ <Control> q”。

trans-unit.source: Converts an accelerator keyval and modifier mask into a string parseable by gtk_accelerator_parse_with_keycode(), similarly to gtk_accelerator_name() but handling keycodes. This is only useful for system-level components, applications should use gtk_accelerator_parse() instead.
trans-unit.target: 将加速器keyval和修饰符掩码转换为可由 gtk_accelerator_parse_with_keycode() 解析的字符串，类似于 gtk_accelerator_name() ,但处理密钥代码。这仅对系统级组件有用，应用程序应改用 gtk_accelerator_parse() 。

trans-unit.source: Converts an accelerator keyval and modifier mask into a string which can be used to represent the accelerator to the user.
trans-unit.target: 将加速器的键值和修饰符掩码转换为字符串,用于向用户表示加速器。

trans-unit.source: Converts bin_window coordinates to coordinates for the tree (the full scrollable area of the tree).
trans-unit.target: 将bin_window坐标转换为树的坐标(树的全部可滚动区域)。

trans-unit.source: Converts bin_window coordinates to widget relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 将bin_window坐标转换为小组件的相对坐标。

trans-unit.source: Converts coordinate (buffer_x , buffer_y ) to coordinates for the window win , and stores the result in (window_x , window_y ).
trans-unit.target: 将坐标（ buffer_x ， buffer_y ）转换为窗口 win 的坐标，并将结果存储在（ window_x ， window_y ）中。

trans-unit.source: Converts coordinates on the window identified by win to buffer coordinates, storing the result in (buffer_x ,buffer_y ).
trans-unit.target: 将 win 标识的窗口上的坐标转换为缓冲区坐标，并将结果存储在（ buffer_x ， buffer_y ）中。

trans-unit.source: Copies text, tags, and paintables between start and end (the order of start and end doesn’t matter) and inserts the copy at iter . Used instead of simply getting/inserting text because it preserves images and tags. If start and end are in a different buffer from buffer , the two buffers must share the same tag table.
trans-unit.target: 复制文本，标签和之间paintables start 和 end （顺序 start 和 end 并不重要），并在插入复制 iter 。用于保留文本和标签，而不是简单地获取/插入文本。如果 start 和 end 都在从不同的缓冲区 buffer ，两个缓冲区必须共享相同的变量表。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents to the clipboard and deletes it from the widget.

trans-unit.source: Create a closure with the given arguments. See gtk_builder_create_closure() for more details on those. The C implementation will try to use dlsym() to locate the function name and then g_cclosure_new() to create a closure for the symbol. The default implementation just fails and returns NULL.

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkCellAreaContext to be used with area for all purposes. GtkCellAreaContext stores geometry information for rows for which it was operated on, it is important to use the same context for the same row of data at all times (i.e. one should render and handle events with the same GtkCellAreaContext which was used to request the size of those rows of data).
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkCellAreaContext，以用于所有目的的 area 。GtkCellAreaContext存储对其进行操作的行的几何信息，重要的是始终在同一数据行中使用相同的上下文（即，应使用用于请求大小的GtkCellAreaContext来呈现和处理事件）。这些数据行）。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkDragIcon that shows paintable , and associates it with the drag operation. The hotspot position on the paintable is aligned with the hotspot of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkDragIcon昭示着 paintable ，并与拖动操作相关联。可绘制对象上的热点位置与光标的热点对齐。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkIconPaintable for a file with a given size and scale GtkIconPaintable. The icon can then be rendered by using it as a GdkPaintable.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkIconPaintable对于一个给定的大小和规模文件GtkIconPaintable。然后可以通过将其用作GdkPaintable来呈现该图标。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkImage displaying an icon from the current icon theme. If the icon name isn’t known, a “broken image” icon will be displayed instead. If the current icon theme is changed, the icon will be updated appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkImage，显示来自当前图标主题的图标。如果不知道图标名称，则会显示“残破的图像”图标。如果更改了当前图标的主题，则将适当更新图标。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkPasswordEntry.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkPasswordEntry。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkPopoverMenu and populates it according to model .
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkPopoverMenu并根据 model 进行填充。

trans-unit.target: 创建GtkPopoverMenuBar从GMenuModel。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkScaleButton, with a range between min and max , with a stepping of step .
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkScaleButton，其范围在 min 和 max 之间，并 step 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkSearchBar. You will need to tell it about which widget is going to be your text entry using gtk_search_bar_connect_entry().
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkSearchBar。您需要使用 gtk_search_bar_connect_entry() 告诉它哪个小部件将成为您的文本输入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkSearchEntry, with a find icon when the search field is empty, and a clear icon when it isn't.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkSearchEntry，如果搜索字段为空，则带有一个查找图标，如果不是，则带有一个清除图标。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkShortcutTrigger that will trigger whenever either of the two given triggers gets triggered.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkShortcutTrigger，该触发将在两个给定触发器中的任何一个触发时触发。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkShortcutTrigger that will trigger whenever the key with the given keyval and modifiers is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkShortcutTrigger，只要按下具有给定 keyval 和 modifiers 的键，就会触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkShortcutTrigger that will trigger whenever the key with the given keyval is pressed and mnemonics have been activated.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkShortcutTrigger，只要按下具有给定 keyval 的键并激活了助记符，该触发器就会触发。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkTextTag. Configure the tag using object arguments, i.e. using g_object_set().
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkTextTag。使用对象参数（即，使用 g_object_set() )配置标签。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkVideo to play back the given file .
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkVideo播放给定的 file 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkVideo to play back the given filename .
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkVideo播放给定的 filename 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkVideo to play back the given stream .
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkVideo播放给定的 stream 。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkVideo来播放给定 resource_path 处的资源。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GtkVolumeButton, with a range between 0.0 and 1.0, with a stepping of 0.02. Volume values can be obtained and modified using the functions from GtkScaleButton.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkVolumeButton，范围在0.0到1.0之间，步进为0.02。可以使用GtkScaleButton中的功能获取和修改音量值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a cairo_surface_t representation of the item at path . This image is used for a drag icon.
trans-unit.target: 在 path 处创建该项目的cairo_surface_t表示形式。该图像用于拖动图标。

trans-unit.source: Creates a cairo_surface_t representation of the row at path . This image is used for a drag icon.
trans-unit.target: 在 path 处创建该行的cairo_surface_t表示形式。该图像用于拖动图标。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GAppInfo for the specified GtkRecentInfo
trans-unit.target: 为指定的GtkRecentInfo创建一个GAppInfo

trans-unit.target: 创建一个GtkExpression，在计算 closure 时会调用闭包。将使用 this 对象以及对 params 表达式求值的结果来调用 closure 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a dynamically-allocated copy of an iterator. This function is not useful in applications, because iterators can be copied with a simple assignment (GtkTextIter i = j;). The function is used by language bindings.
trans-unit.target: 创建迭代器的动态分配副本。此函数在应用程序中无用，因为可以通过简单的分配（ GtkTextIter i = j; ）复制迭代器。该功能由语言绑定使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a list of all selected children.
trans-unit.target: 创建所有选中的孩子的列表。

trans-unit.source: Creates a list of constraints from a formal description using a compact description syntax called VFL, or "Visual Format Language".
trans-unit.target: 使用被称为VFL或 "Visual Format Language "的紧凑描述语法,从形式化描述中创建一个约束列表。

trans-unit.source: Creates a list of constraints they formal description using a compact description syntax called VFL, or "Visual Format Language".
trans-unit.target: 创建一个约束列表,他们使用一个紧凑的描述语法VFL,或 "视觉格式语言 "的形式描述。

trans-unit.source: Creates a list of known paper sizes.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个已知纸张尺寸的列表。

trans-unit.source: Creates a list of path of all selected rows. Additionally, if you are planning on modifying the model after calling this function, you may want to convert the returned list into a list of GtkTreeRowReferences. To do this, you can use gtk_tree_row_reference_new().
trans-unit.target: 创建所有选定行的路径列表。另外，如果您打算在调用此函数后修改模型，则可能需要将返回的列表转换为GtkTreeRowReferences的列表。为此，您可以使用 gtk_tree_row_reference_new() 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a list of paths of all selected items. Additionally, if you are planning on modifying the model after calling this function, you may want to convert the returned list into a list of GtkTreeRowReferences. To do this, you can use gtk_tree_row_reference_new().
trans-unit.target: 创建所有选定项目的路径列表。另外，如果您打算在调用此函数后修改模型，则可能需要将返回的列表转换为GtkTreeRowReferences的列表。为此，您可以使用 gtk_tree_row_reference_new() 。

trans-unit.source: Creates a mark at position where . If mark_name is NULL, the mark is anonymous; otherwise, the mark can be retrieved by name using gtk_text_buffer_get_mark(). If a mark has left gravity, and text is inserted at the mark’s current location, the mark will be moved to the left of the newly-inserted text. If the mark has right gravity (left_gravity = FALSE), the mark will end up on the right of newly-inserted text. The standard left-to-right cursor is a mark with right gravity (when you type, the cursor stays on the right side of the text you’re typing).
trans-unit.target: 在位置创建一个标记 where 。如果 mark_name 为 NULL ，则标记为匿名；否则，标记为匿名。否则，可以使用 gtk_text_buffer_get_mark() 通过名称检索该标记。如果标记具有重力，并且在该标记的当前位置插入了文本，则该标记将移动到新插入的文本的左侧。如果标记具有右重力（ left_gravity = FALSE ），则标记将最终位于新插入的文本的右侧。标准的从左到右光标是带有右重力的标记（当您键入时，光标停留在所键入文本的右侧）。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的GtkMountOperation

trans-unit.target: 为可以处理给定类型的内容的应用程序创建一个新的GtkAppChooserWidget。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的GtkApplication实例。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的GtkApplicationWindow。
